page.title: 16The Tower-A Parish Magazine
page.content: The local Parish magazine is called 'The Tower' and covers the villages of Fryerning, Margaretting, Ingatestone and Buttsbury. It comes out once a month and costs 20 pence. About 600 copies of each issue are sold. The overall editor is the Rev. Canon E.F.Hudson of Ingatestone. Major Bird looks after the day-to-day working of the magazine and Mr.K. Langford helps to link the Fryerning/ Margaretting information. The cost of producing the magazine is helped by income from advertisements for mainly local shops and services. There are regular letters from the Rector and from the Rev.J.E.Gravelle, the Priest in Charge at Fryerning & Margaretting and many of the local clubs and organisations also have letters and features. The work is mainly voluntary and keeps the villagers well informed.
